channel.title: Courses on Christian Malaga-Chuquitaype
channel.description: Recent content in Courses on Christian Malaga-Chuquitaype

item.title: Building Resilient Structures (Imperial)
item.description: This undergraduate course forms part of the I-Explore modules.

item.title: Seismic Design of Steel Structures (Imperial)
item.description: This graduate course introduces the principles of seismic design of steel structures.

item.title: Structural Dynamics (Imperial)
item.description: This undergraduate course covers the classical dynamics theory of SDOF.
